Name: Surging Undercurrent
Title: Abyss Herald: Surging Undercurrent
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Surging Undercurrent
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2203]</color>, who has this card equipped, has already triggered <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122031]</color>, then create 1 $[K1022] on the opposing playing field.\nWhen $[A2203], who has this card equipped, is defeated or triggers $[C122031]: Create 1 $[K1022] on the opposing playing field.\n(You must have $[A2203] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

C122031.Name: Watery Rebirth
C122031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, $[K100] this character deals is converted to $[K102], and $[K102] +1.

K54.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Immunity to Defeat</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>
K54.Desc: Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#FFFFFFFF>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.\nWhen this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#FFFFFFFF>defeat.</color> (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>ï¼šDMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K1022.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Curse of the Undercurrent</color>
K1022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When character(s) on this side of the playing field use Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts:</color> They must spend 1 extra Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color>: 2</color>
